metadata.title: CVE-2019-3995 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ELOG 3.1.4-57bea22 and below is affected by a denial of servicevulnerability due to a NULL pointer dereference. A remote unauthenticatedattacker can crash the ELOG server by sending a crafted HTTP GET request.

criterions.comment: elog: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
